analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x1c9055f7ecc5c679b85393b970b17eefc3a8cf98.sol:
	Contract SolarDaoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x1c9055f7ecc5c679b85393b970b17eefc3a8cf98.sol#176-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in SolarDaoTokenCrowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/9/0x1c9055f7ecc5c679b85393b970b17eefc3a8cf98.sol#426-462):
	External calls:
	- tokensAmount = calculateTokens(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x1c9055f7ecc5c679b85393b970b17eefc3a8cf98.sol#436)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/9/0x1c9055f7ecc5c679b85393b970b17eefc3a8cf98.sol#450)
